model.description: Verbrauch braucht erst einige Monate bis er aussagekrÃ¤ftig ist.  Fremdladungen werden ignoriert und verfÃ¤lschen das Ergebnis.
model.title: Fahrzeuge

libraryPanel.name: EVCC: Energien aufsummiert Ã¼ber die Zeit

targets.query: SELECT value as "pv" FROM "pvMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value as "grid" FROM "gridMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1)  as home FROM "homeMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as loadpoint1 FROM "loadpoint1MonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as loadpoint2 FROM "loadpoint2MonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as feedin FROM "feedInMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
